item.title: World Bank CO2 Emissions Data
item.description: How did global CO2 emissions change between 1960 and 2011?

Hi. My name is Matthew. I post bits of data analysis I do using SQL in Google Colab notebooks. A recent transplant to the Bay Area, I used to work as a management consultant back home in London, focusing on procurement and operational excellence. Prior to that, I completed my PhD in German Literature. You can also check out my Tableau visualizations here:
